_json.gridTitle: The Godfather's Spaghetti Sauce Recipe  - Food.com
_json.description: It is claimed that in 1973, Glamour Magazine posted this recipe based on a scene in the movie The Godfather: Heh, come over here, kid, learn something. You never know, you might have to cook for 20 guys someday. You see, you start out with a little bit of oil. Then you fry some garlic. Then you throw in some tomatoes, tomato paste, you fry it; ya make sure it doesnt stick. You get it to a boil; you shove in all your sausage and your meatballs; hehâ€¦? And a little bit o wine. An a little bit ...
